metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Wall and near HAG SurvivorsAfter Foundry destroyed, SW is abandoned, only kids came to look at it.Kid Please rename to Markiza interested in the SW
metadata.how_to_trigger: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-47.817879;26.905397;-110.095284&camTarget=-47.641701;26.354410;-109.279579ReCon `SetGlobalOsirisFlag GLO_Foundry_State_ControlCentreDestroyed`Wait for kids to appear and run to SW

0.speaker: Markiza
0.text: Look at this thing, Doober! It's still kind of scary, only not really.

1.speaker: Markiza
1.text: I don't like it, Doober. It's too big, and too clanky, and it smells like rotten eggs.
